newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Johnsburg Central School Dist, NY.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Johnsburg Central School Dist, NY.

text.p: SUMMARY NOTICE OF BOND SALE
JOHNSBURG CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT
(WARREN COUNTY)
NEW YORK
GENERAL OBLIGATION SCHOOL DISTRICT (SERIAL) BONDS, 1996
(BOOK-ENTRY-ONLY) (CALLABLE) (BANK QUALIFIED)

SEALED PROPOSALS will be received and considered by the President of the Board of Education of Johnsburg Central School District, Warren County, New York at the offices of Fleet Bank, Private Banking Department, Mezzanine Level, One East Avenue, Rochester, New York 14638, until 11:00 A.M.,

Prevailing Time, on at which time and place the bids will be opened, for the purchase IN FEDERAL FUNDS at not less than par and accrued interest of $3,050,000 School District (Serial) Bonds, 1996, (the "Bonds"), maturing on June 15 of each year as follows:
MATURITIES
The Bonds will be dated December 15, 1996 and will bear interest payable semi annually on June 15 and December 15 of each year commencing June 15, 1997.

The Bonds will be awarded to the bidder offering to purchase the Bonds at such rate or rates of interest as will produce the lowest net interest cost in accordance with the terms set forth in the Notice of Sale.
The Bonds maturing on or after June 15, 2005 are subject to redemption at the option of the School District in accordance with the terms set forth in the Notice of Sale.
The School District will designate the Bonds as "qualified tax-exempt obligations" pursuant to Section 265(b)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended.
The Bonds will be issued by means of a book-entry-only system with The Depository Trust Company, New York, New York, which will act as securities depository for the Bonds.
The School District will furnish the Bonds and the approving legal opinion of Ruberti, Girvin & Ferlazzo, Albany, New York, on or about December 19, 1996.
Requests for copies of the Notice of Sale herein

summarized and the Official Statement relating to the Bonds and such other information as the State Comptroller may prescribe by rule or order may be directed to Bernard P. Donegan, Inc., PO Box 70, Victor, New York 14564; Phone
Dated: November 12, 1996 William Conner
Johnsburg, New York President, Board of Educ
(From The Bond Buyer)
--U.S. Municipal Desk, 212-859-1650
